title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8109.18 - Town of Plattsburgh
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8109.18 - Town of Plattsburgh

State Regulations
(a) Town

Road, Military Turnpike Extension. The northbound and southbound roadway of the

Military Turnpike Extension, between the intersection of Route 3 and a point
1+- mile south of the Military Turnpike Extension at the Yellow Freight Systems

Inc., terminal. (b) Route 3. The
eastbound and westbound roadways of Cornelia Street, Route 3, between the
intersection of IR 87 and Route 3, and the intersection of Route 190. (c) Route 314. The eastbound and westbound
roadway of Route 314 between IR 87, exit 39 and Route 9, a distance of 0.3
mile. (d) Route 22. Route 22
between I-87, exit 38, and the Industrial Park Road, a distance of 0.75+-
mile. (e) Industrial Park Road. Industrial Park Road between Route 22 and the Roadway Services Terminal, a
distance of 0.50+- mile. (f) Hammond Lane. Hammond Lane from the intersection of Route 3 to Kastner Road, a
distance of 0.3+- mile. (g) Kastner

Road. Kastner Road from the intersection of Hammond Lane to the St. Johnsburry

Trucking facility, a distance of 0.2+- mile. (h) Cumberland Head Road (CR 578, Route 314)
between US Route 9 and the Cumberland Head-Grand Isle Ferry, a distance of
4.0+- miles. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8109.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
